There were no other sightings in Melbourne Beach on or around February 19th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI WENT OUTSIDE AT 9:35 PM AND I SAW THE RED GLOBE IN THE EAST SKY. IT WAS ABOUT THE SIZE OF A FULL MOON. I CALLED MY WIFE OUT TO SEE IT. SHE SAW IT THEN WENT BACK IN TO GET THE CAMERA. WHEN I LOOKED FOR IT,IT WAS GONE. THEN IT REAPPEARED AND MOVED FURTHER AWAY EASTWARD. THAT IS WHEN I GOT A PICTURE OF IT. THEN IT WAS GONE AND WE DID NOT SEE IT AGAIN. IT WAS OUR FIRST SIGHTING OF A UFO. WE DO NOT KNOW WHAT IT WAS, AND WE BOTH SAW IT. TV NEWS THAT NIGHT DID NOT MENTION ANYTHING ABOUT IT. I SPOKE TO A NEIGHBOR A WEEK OR SO LATER AND HE SAW A RED GLOBE AT 2AM ONE NIGHT WITHIN DAYS AFTER WE SAW IT. I KEEP LOOKING FOR IT.
Summary: It was a red sphere with a white center.
